name: Tinkerers of the Igneous Hounds
description: Hailing from the searing apex of Mt. Kalfus, the Tinkerers of the Igneous Hounds are known for their skill in shadow magic. Specifically moving from shadow and shadow, smuggling goods within the shadows of clueless civilians. Now serving as full-time mercenaries (and part-time arsonists), they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
